xml.data:
Home » 15A3 Tikanipātapāḷi » 3 Tatiyapaṇṇāsaka » 3.5 Maṅgalavagga
3.5.4 Asucisutta
Tatiyapaṇṇāsaka
Maṅgalavagga
Asucisutta
150.
1072“Tīhi, bhikkhave…pe…  asucinā kāyakammena, asucinā vacīkammena, asucinā manokammena—  imehi kho…pe…  evaṃ niraye.
1073Tīhi, bhikkhave…pe…  sucinā kāyakammena, sucinā vacīkammena, sucinā manokammena—  imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
1074Catutthaṃ.
<< 3.5.3 Visamasuttaup3.5.5 Paṭhamakhatasutta >>
